block.p: FISHMAN-Annamae (Folston), 88 years old, July 20, 2000. Beloved wife of Julius, loving mother of Louis, Cynthia, Bettejane and Susan; cherished grandmother of eleven and great-grandmother of three. Sister of Gertrude. You were a gift that we will always treasure. Services will be held on Sunday, July 23, at 1PM, at the Riverside-Nassau North Chapel, Great Neck. Interment at Knollwood Cemetery, Brooklyn. In lieu of flowers, please make donations to your favorite charity.
